org.deri.tarql

Class TarqlQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deri.tarql.TarqlQuery

  • public class TarqlQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    A Tarql mapping. Conceptually, this is one or more SPARQL queries with a shared prologue (prefixes and base declarations).
